QuestData.Title: A Most Unusual Map
QuestData.Description: Here's the deal, mate: to protect me treasure map, I tattooed it onto me first mate's scalp.$B$BOf course, he's dead now, along with most of me crew. The Alliance doesn't even know what they have - his severed head is hanging from a tree at the entrance to this camp.$B$BGrab that head and take it to Gazlowe back in Ratchet.
QuestData.LogDescription: Get the Tattooed Head from the entrance to the Alliance compound.
QuestData.CompletionText: Was Baron Longshore alive? Do you have anything for me?
QuestData.RewardText: What? What is this? I send you out to fetch my treasure and you bring me a big filthy head?
